survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels with subscription-based meal kit delivery services, focusing on delivery experience, meal variety, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the meal kits you receive?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the options are balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the meal kits you receive?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Include an option for occasional users to capture different usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use the subscription-based meal kit service?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key decision-making factors.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the freshness of the ingredients provided in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to assess ingredient quality perceptions.

script.question_text: How would you rate the freshness of the ingredients provided in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the meal kit service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the meal kit service.
